name: coe1fvalcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cfv(c3, c2), c4))

stmt.origin: ffvelrnda(c2, cn0, c3, c4, wcel(c0, c1))
stmt.pretty: ffvelrnda(c2, cn0, c3, c4, c0 ∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cfv(c3, c2), c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c3, cn0, c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cfv(c3, c2), c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c3, cn0, c4))

stmt.origin: coe1f(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c3, cn0, c4))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cco1, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c6))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c6))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cn0)), wcel(cfv(c3, c2), c4))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cco1, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c6))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c6))

comment: A coefficient of a univariate polynomial over a class/ring is an element of this class/ring. (Contributed by AV, 9-Oct-2019.)
